amendment.description: Amendment sought to target OPIC Infrastructure Funds for support of health services, water, sanitation, schools, electrification, and transportation; and allocate 70% of funding to small, women, and minority-owned businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 2, printed in H. Rept. 106-236 to target OPIC Infrastructure Funds for health services, water, sanitation, schools, electrification, and transportation; allocate 70% of funding to small business, women, and minority-owned businesses with at least 60% African ownership and 40% U.S. ownership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (IL) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
